mapper.insert: insert into blog (title, author_id, category_id, content) values (#{title} ,#{authorId}, #{categoryId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from blog where is_exit = 1 order by create_time desc limit #{start},#{size}
select * from blog where category_id = #{categoryId} and is_exit = 1 order by create_time desc limit #{start},#{size}
select count(*) from blog where is_exit = 1
select count(*) from blog where is_exit = 1 and category_id = #{categoryId}
select * from blog where id = #{id} and is_exit = 1
select count(*) from blog where id = #{id} and is_exit = 1
select * from blog where author_id = #{userId} and is_exit = 1
